abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers defeat Atlanta Hawks, 110-108, in overtime; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: James scored 29 points, passing another Hall of Famer on the N.B.A.’s career scoring list, and the Cleveland Cavaliers edged the Atlanta Hawks, 110-108.

headline.main: LeBron James Passes Robertson as Cavs Edge Hawks
headline.print_headline: James Passes Robertson as Cavs Edge Hawks

snippet: James scored 29 points, passing another Hall of Famer on the N.B.A.’s career scoring list, and the Cleveland Cavaliers edged the Atlanta Hawks, 110-108.
